title: Sofia Richie goes topless as she poses in multiple denim brands after using hairstylist as footrest
text:
Sofia Richie has been known to sport one stunning look or another, from red carpets to Fashion Week to her Vegas birthday party.

But the model recently cut one of her most eye-catching looks yet, which barely included any clothes.

She took to Instagram Thursday with a sultry photo of herself posing topless in nothing but jeans.

Topless Thursday: Sofia Richie took to Instagram Thursday with a sultry photo of herself posing topless in nothing but jeans

The 21-year-old captioned the photo from her shoot for Australian brand Rolla's Jeans: 'How’s your Thursday?'

She struck a profile pose as she showed off her pert derrière in the slim jeans, while covering up her chest with her hands.

Richie later posted another topless denim look, this time donning a Diesel x Coca Cola dark denim jacket.

She wore the loose-fitting piece with nothing underneath, showing off a glimpse of sideboob.

Blue jean baby: She later posted another topless denim look, this time donning a Diesel x Coca Cola dark denim jacket

Double denim: Richie wore the loose-fitting piece with nothing underneath, showing off a glimpse of sideboob

The jacket, made from recycled plastic, was paired with some matching dark denim high-waisted baggy jeans.

Richie also posted some footage from the hair and makeup chair before her denim shoot.

The daughter of a music legend also used a member of her glam squad as a footrest.

Beauty chair: Richie also posted some footage from the hair and makeup chair before her denim shoot

Hard day: The daughter of a music legend used a member of her glam squad as a footrest

Glam squad: But it all seemed to be in good fun as they all played around with an Instagram filter afterward

But it all seemed to be in good fun as they all played around with an Instagram filter afterward.

Richie recently made her long-overdue debut on Keeping Up with the Kardashians with boyfriend Scott Disick.

The episode followed the couple as they went on vacation with his ex Kourtney Kardashian and their three children to Finland.
description: Richie recently made her long-overdue debut on Keeping Up with the Kardashians with boyfriend Scott Disick, as they went on vacation with his ex Kourtney Kardashian to Finland.
